author: xtqqczze
body:
Partially revert 7ead1374072c2664f5830fceb6b281a500196d0a.

#15452 made changes to frozen code to fix the build, but since #15677 we skip analyzers for `src/Microsoft.Management.UI.Internal/Microsoft.PowerShell.GraphicalHost.csproj`

cc: @iSazonov
title: Partially revert changes to `src/Microsoft.Management.UI.Internal/`
